button.name: action_open_locally
button.title: Open Locally
button.invisible: active_security or is_locked or owner_lock or not perm_open_locally

button.name: action_preview
button.title: Preview File
button.invisible: active_security or is_locked or owner_lock or not perm_preview_file

button.name: download_attachment
button.title: Download File
button.invisible: active_security or is_locked or owner_lock or not perm_download

button.name: action_edit
button.title: Edit Online
button.invisible: not is_pdf or active_security or is_locked or owner_lock or not perm_edit_online

field.name: security_status
field.invisible: (not owner_lock and not is_locked) or is_deleted

button.name: lock
button.invisible: is_locked == True or is_deleted == 1 or perm_encrypt == False

button.name: locked_by_owner
button.invisible: owner_lock == True or is_locked == True or is_deleted == 1 or perm_lock == False

button.name: unlocked_by_owner
button.invisible: owner_lock == False or is_locked == True or is_deleted == 1 or perm_unlock == False

button.name: download_attachment
button.invisible: content == False or owner_lock== True or access_id.perm_download == False or perm_download == False

field.name: directory_id
field.invisible: is_locked == True or owner_lock == True or disable_directory == True
